name: Allergic to Repetition
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night, only to find yourself being sucked up into the sky by a strange, glowing beam. As you struggle to free yourself, you realize that you are not alone - debris from your surroundings is also being pulled upwards, including rocks, electricity poles, and even entire buildings.

As you look up, you see a massive spaceship hovering above you, its metallic exterior gleaming in the moonlight. You are terrified, but also curious - what do these aliens want with you? And can you use the surrounding obstacles to escape their grasp?

In this 2D pixel art game, you play as a character who is being abducted by aliens and is being pulled up into their spaceship. As you float upwards, you must navigate through a series of obstacles that are also being pulled towards the ship, including debris from your surroundings and other hazards.

Using your skills and quick reflexes, you must jump, dodge, and slide your way, surviving as long as you can, avoiding obstacles and enemies as you go. The longer you survive the stronger the ship's pool will be.

Controls:

Movement - AD or Arrows

Jump - Space
